hero.title: My Projects
hero.subtitle: Showcasing my work across different domains

introduction.title: Project Portfolio
introduction.content: Here are the projects I've worked on, organized by category. Each project represents a unique challenge and solution that showcases different aspects of my skills and experience. From **web development** and **UI/UX design** to **experiential engineering**, these projects demonstrate my ability to tackle complex problems and deliver innovative solutions.

projectCategories.title: SaaS Experiential Content Management Systems
projectCategories.description: My bread and butter. I'm on a crusade to make the most designer, developer, and content-manager friendly system out there. I think that there's a ton of untapped potential in this market, and I'm the only person I know who's worked on two or more of these systems.

projectCategories.title: Experiential Projects
projectCategories.description: In my brief time as an experiential developer, I got to work on some pretty cool projects. These really opened up my eyes to how a CMS can make their lives much easier if done right.

projectCategories.title: Full-Stack Development
projectCategories.description: End-to-end web applications that demonstrate full-stack development capabilities and modern architecture.

contactCTA.text: Interested in working together? Let's discuss your project and see how I can help bring your vision to life.
